job.title: Software Engineer
job.description: <p>MZ Development (“MZD”) was founded in 2015 by assessment and technology experts with a shared vision for making performance assessment a reality for all. Since then, MZD’s platforms (<strong>OSCAR</strong>, <strong>OSCAR Classroom</strong> and <strong>ADAM</strong>) have been used by forward looking K-12 school districts and leading testing organizations to enhance their assessment programs.&nbsp;Our clients expect us to deliver innovative EdTech solutions that make performance assessment a realistic option for them.&nbsp;</p><p><br></p><p>Now we are looking to add to our talented engineering team. This position will be part of a virtual team of engineers who have a love for education and developing technology to improve it. Responsibilities include gathering user requirements, defining system functionality and writing code in various languages.</p><p><br></p><p>Ultimately, the role of the Software Engineer is to build high-quality, innovative and fully performing software that complies with coding standards and technical design.</p><p><br></p><p><strong>Responsibilities</strong></p><p><br></p><p>This position reports to the CTO and will have responsibility for new product development and support. </p><p><br></p><p>Responsibilities include:</p><p>·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Execute full software development life cycle (SDLC)</p><p>·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Write well-designed, testable code</p><p>·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Produce specifications and determine operational feasibility</p><p>·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Integrate software components into a fully functional software system</p><p>·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Develop software verification plans and quality assurance procedures</p><p>·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Document and maintain software functionality</p><p>·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Troubleshoot, debug and upgrade existing systems</p><p>·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Deploy programs and evaluate user feedback</p><p>·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Comply with project plans and industry standards</p><p>·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Ensure software is updated with latest features</p><p><br></p><p><strong>Required Skills and Experience</strong></p><p><br></p><p>·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;BS degree in Computer Science, Engineering or relevant experience </p><p>·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Proven work experience as a Software Engineer or Software Developer (2-4 years)</p><p>·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Experience with web development (2-4) years</p><p>·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Familiarity with AWS hosted applications</p><p>·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Experience using Go, Vue, Python, TensorFlow or MongoDB (desired)</p><p>·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Experience with test-driven development</p><p>·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Proficiency in software engineering tools</p><p>·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Ability to document requirements and specifications</p><p>·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Ability and desire to work as part of a virtual </p><p>·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Experience with GIT or similar VCS tools&nbsp;</p>
